plot outline: Five friends find themselves stuck in a job that at first promised to be so simple - After rigorous preparations, they soon realise that instead of carrying out the plan, they have become its targets. Five accomplices, five suspects: obviously, one of them is guilty. But who?
title: 5 Idiots
plot: Five friends find themselves stuck in a job that at first promised to be so simple - After rigorous preparations, they soon realise that instead of carrying out the plan, they have become its targets. Five accomplices, five suspects: obviously, one of them is guilty. But who?
